SyncMessageDialog.changesNotAppliedDescription: Your last edit could not be applied because someone else updated the document. It has now been refreshed to show the latest version.
SyncMessageDialog.documentUpdatedDescription: This document has been updated by another user since you last modified it.
SyncMessageDialog.reviewAndRetry: Please review the updated document and try your edit again.

createDemoDocumentDescription: This will create a practice document using the Docufen testing template with pre-filled information.

cursorValidation.inSystemContent: Cannot insert in the middle of system content (initials, dates, markers). Place cursor after the complete initials/date line.
cursorValidation.inUserContent: Cannot insert in the middle of existing user-entered text. Place cursor at the start of the text, at the end after the initials line, or in original document text.

tableCellInsertion.offDescription: Your text is added as a new paragraph
tableCellInsertion.onDescription: Your text appears exactly where you place the cursor
tableCellInsertion.title: Insert at cursor position:

tableCellInsertion.description: Allow users the option to insert text exactly where their cursor is placed, instead of appending entries in a new paragraph.
tableCellInsertion.title: Insert at Cursor Position

tooltip.disabled: When disabled: All entries automatically append as a new paragraph.
tooltip.enabled:
When enabled: Users can toggle between two insertion modes:

• Insert at cursor - Text appears exactly where the cursor is placed

• Append - Text is added as a new paragraph
